metadata.synopsis: Three people are nerding out about the Steel Watchers. They have an unofficial fanclub in which they meet to discuss them - one was just thrown by a Watcher (for climbing up on it), and they're all jealous. This is the gnome's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 3; 49; 133- To the the gnome nerd

0.speaker: Vinegaroon
0.text: You a Steel Watcher fan, too? If so, we meet here everyday to discuss their mechanics!

1.speaker: Vinegaroon
1.text: The optics, the motorised pistons, the propulsion stabilisers - and when they're all working together... it's like a symphony of steel.
